text: Singju or Singsu (Manipuri salad) is a Meitei Manipuri dish, mainly made up of a leafy green vegetables. It is generally consumed as a spicy side dish. Notably, Singju festival, an annual fair is organized in the promotion of the food item in India. ==Gallery== File:Thambou_singju_(2).jpg File:Thambou_singju.jpg File:Morok_metpa.jpg File:Kobi- Yongchaak_Singju,_simple_preparation,_Nov_2013.jpg File:Heinou_Singju.jpg File:Cabbage_and_chana_Singju.jpg File:Beans_Singju.jpg File:ꯀꯣꯕꯤ ꯄꯥꯅ ꯁꯣꯏꯔꯕ.jpg File:ꯀꯐꯣꯏ ꯁꯤꯡꯖꯨ.jpg File:ꯍꯩꯔꯤꯠ ꯑꯁꯨꯕ.jpg ==References== Category:Meitei food
title: Singju
